title: VITAL Late Game Townie

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Wait until the late game and then become vital.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start the game with no abilities.
- Once only half the players remain, gain 3 town abilities of your choice. The abilities must be from different subalignments. You can not pick the same subalignment again, even if you are picking a new set of abilities.
- You can only get 1 day ability per set of abilities.
- Once you use all your abilities, gain a new set of abilities. You may not repeat abilities.

desc:
